name: Fairies Vs. Scaries Tower Defense
description:
Fairies Vs Scaries Tower Defense is a short totally free kid and girl friendly tower defense game! Use mouse or touchscreen to drag fairies into the forest and defend the castle from the evil forces of skulls, witches and snakes! Ice fairies slow down incoming creeps, Wind and Light fairies fire swift shots, while Napalm fairies cast a powerful fire spell! Retro-inspired graphics and five forest boards.

Made for "F*** This Jam" for Philly Game Forge because I didn't like Tower Defense games and wanted to make one of my own... and make it as girly as possible.
